name: MINDSLAYER
description:
MINDSLAYER 

MindSlayer is a stealth-based action horror game with solid movement-based sections. The player plays as a roguish psychic assassin, a MindSlayer, sent to kill a religiously fanatical Baron. Navigating their way through the maze-like castle, they must avoid enemy detection in tense stealth sections, and take down cult leaders in movement-based mind games in order to locate and assassinate the Baron.

The Baron 

Clovis Parasitus, the Baron of the castle was once a kind and gentle man. In 1860 he took over the castle after his parent's unfortunate death. His first couple years as ruler were great until he got lost in his love for the island's “ God “, consumed by it he began to change. The once peaceful atmosphere on the island is gone. 

The Islands 

The Islands of Zarkonia are located off the coast of France. They consist of three islands that are connected together, the biggest one holding the castle. These islands that used to be full of life, home to various animals and vegetation are now barren. Its inhabitants are disfigured and mutated. What could’ve caused such a change?

The Organisation 

The Mindslayer organisation is an organised group with unnatural abilities. The members of this group all share and are born with a telepathic, telekinetic and special ability that is linked to their family bloodline. All the members of this organisation are part of certain families. The goal of this organisation is to have full control over the world and eliminate anything that threatens this goal.

Controls

WASD - Movement 

Shift - Sprint 

Space - Jump 

CTRL - Crouch 

Right Click - Select the knife 

Left Click -  Use the knife 

ESC - Pause
